challenge.title: The American LGBTQ Rights Movement-  An Introduction
challenge.description: Kyle Morgan and Meg Rodriguez's The American LGBTQ Rights Movement: An Introduction is textbook that covers the history of the American LGBT movement.
challenge.instructions: Read The American LGBTQ Rights Movement: An Introduction.
